page.title: 12TIBSHELF MILK ROUND
page.content: My dad works as a milkman. He has got two helpers called Keith and Andy. He gets the milk from Express Dairy. He takes the milk round every day except Christmas Day and Boxing Day. He gets up between 5.00 and 5.30 in the morning. First of all he delivers to the houses in Tibshelf, then he goes to Wingerworth and Tupton. He has to make sure that the right milk is taken to the right house. When he has finished he takes the milk that is left over back to the dairy and then comes back home. On Fridays he goes round collecting the money and then he pays his milk bill. The money left over he keeps. Sometimes I go round with him and help deliver the milk. He gives me Â£3.50 a week. by Ryan (11)
